snippet.title: Toastercide Gameplay Trailer
snippet.description:
Wishlist Toastercide on Steam!
https://linktr.ee/chairmangames

You are a Toaster. As an agent of the ICA, you have been tasked with eliminating targets by expertly maneuvering into their bathtubs. Use your power cord to grapple and swing around physics-based environments to execute a Toastercide, all while navigating as fast as possible.

#indie #indiegame #trailer #toast #toasteroven #gameplay #gaming #spiderman #attackontitan #simulator #simulation #simulatorgames #iambread
